videos.headline: Ahmad Brooks: Virginia Tech's defense 'strangled' Purdue's offense
videos.description: ESPN college football analyst Ahmad Brooks assesses Virginia Tech's 51-24 victory over Purdue.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Analysis (Ahmad Brooks: Virginia Tech’s defense ‘strangled’ Purdue’s offense) 150919 NCFWRAP PVC

videos.headline: Virginia Tech's offense dominated Purdue's offense
videos.description: ESPN college football analysts Anish Shroff and Ahmad Brooks discuss Virginia Tech's 51-24 victory over Purdue in which the Hokies piled up 471 yards and three touchdowns on offense, while the Boilermakers mustered just 265 offensive yards.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Analysis (Virginia Tech's offense dominated Purdue's offense) 15/09/19 ESHEET NCFWRAP PVC
